entry.title: Wednesday: Freezing rain or ice pellets. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Ice pellets or freezing rain beginning early this morning then changing to freezing rain this morning then changing to periods of rain this afternoon. Ice pellet amount 2 cm. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Showers. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening and after midnight. Local amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early in the morning. Clearing near noon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High 10. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
